summary:
Capital Change Notice Summary

EROAD Limited (NZX: ERD)

  • Class of Security: Performance Share Rights (PSRs) convertible to ordinary shares (exercise price: $0).
  • Total PSRs Issued:
  • FY24 Grant: 127,828 PSRs (4.12% of class).
  • FY25 Grant: 2,039,249 PSRs (63.07% of class).
  • Vesting Conditions:
  • Tranche 1: Employment continuation until 31 Mar 2026 (FY24) / 31 Mar 2027 (FY25).
  • Tranche 2: Relative TSR vs. S&P/ASX All Technology Index (40th–100th percentile).
  • Tranche 3: Absolute financial performance (revenue/EBIT/free cash flow vs. 3-year budget).
  • Total Outstanding PSRs: 5,272,563 (including prior grants).
  • Issue Dates: 28 July 2025 (both grants).

Material Impact:
- Potential dilution from PSR conversions (up to 200% vesting for top TSR performance).
- No immediate cash impact (exercise price: $0).

Next Steps: Monitor vesting milestones (FY24: 2026; FY25: 2027) and TSR/performance triggers.

(Concise, omits legal boilerplate and non-material grant mechanics.)
